messages.2: Maybe some day I will add new levels
messages.3: Aren't you suppose to be doing homework?
messages.5: Made by the creators of Boxel Rebound.
messages.6: Terraria is a pretty cool game.
messages.9: Fact: I am bad at Fortnite.
messages.12: You should make a level during class.
messages.13: Made with 20 cups of coffee every day.
messages.14: Lower the graphics to speed up the game.
messages.15: I hope you have a great day.
messages.17: I tried doing homework once, did not like it.
messages.18: I make levels during my day job.
messages.19: I wish this game had more levels.
messages.20: Do not share your friend code with strangers!
messages.22: My score is way better than your score.
messages.23: Backup your data so you can play on other computers.
messages.24: If you want to make games for a living, start by making levels.
messages.26: Shoutout to Stack Overflow for all the help!
messages.27: Now available on the TI-84+ Silver Edition.
messages.28: I think you are a pretty neat person.
messages.29: I am glad you are alive today!
messages.30: Happy Friday! (or whatever day it is)
messages.31: Share kindness (or Boxel 3D) with someone today.
messages.32: You might not feel special today, but you are special to me!
messages.34: Have you tried turning it off and on again?
messages.35: All bugs have been fixed (lol jk)

levels.campaign_level_1: Welcome to Boxel 3D! The easiest game ever made!
levels.campaign_level_3: I meant to tell you this earlier, DO NOT TOUCH THE SPIKES!
levels.campaign_level_5: Did you know you can jump after you fall?
levels.campaign_level_18: Do not forget to jump after you touch the jump pad!
levels.campaign_level_35: Halt! You should not be here!
levels.campaign_level_39: Use your keyboard to move left and right.

text.cloud_data_restored: Success! Your data was restored from your account.
text.cloud_data_saved: Success! Your data was backed up to your account.
text.restore_cloud_data: Restore all data from the cloud?
text.restore_file_data: Restore all data from a file?
text.save_data_to_cloud: Save all local data to the cloud?
text.save_level: Would you like to save your level?

mods.download_instructions: Copy mods from trusted websites and paste them in the clipboard for later.
mods.inspect_instructions: Right-click this game and select Inspect.
mods.paste_instructions: Select the Console tab, paste mods from the clipboard, then press the enter key to load mods.
mods.security: For your security, mods must be manually loaded each time the game is launched.
mods.title: Mods
